activities: We provide web based software as a service for organizations and teams. We do not collect personal information however we do require users to establish an account with email address, first name, last name and company name.
personaldata: We do not collect personal information except for email address, first name, last name, company name.
privacyprograms: TRUSTe is our 3rd party dispute mechanism and verification program.
